name: The Fishing Club 3D
description: Bait your hooks and go sport-fishing around the world! Take part in epic fishing competitions or just go fishing and relax. Tight lines!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Quad Q6600 2.4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 260, AMD Radeon HD 4870 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i7-3770K 4-Core 3.5GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R9 280 Storage: 2 GB available space
